Operated by Disable structure (turn off power and usage) Enable structure Lock this structure (prevent colonists from entering or leaving) Unlock this structure Show Tops Recycle Connect these two structures Edit the contents of this structure Generating (1) out of (2) Power collection per strike: (1) Water Generation Water Consumption Water Consumption (1), of which (2) are consumed by components Consuming (1), of which (2) are consumed by components Power Consumption: (1) Generates oxygen for approximately (1) people Consumes the equivalent of (1) people Slow production and low maintenance Fast production and high maintenance Starchy Adjust specialization percentages for the colony. This planet has no atmosphere There is no risk of meteors on this planet There are no predictable disasters in this planet There is no risk of thunderstorms on this planet (1) requires (2) Waiting for (1) visitors at the base Prioritize work in this structure Go back to normal priority Work in this structure has priority High Durability: This resource will last for longer before disintegrating Recycling this construction would split the base in 2 To edit a structure it has to be operational and have at least one interior connection Production limit for (1) Left click to focus, right click to dismiss. Low Stats: This colonist will perform tasks at reduced speed. Very Low Stats: This colonist will only perform critical tasks, at a reduced speed. Critical Stats: This colonist will not perform any tasks.
Class D Class F Class M Class S Accessible Challenging Overwhelming Suicide Medium size desert planet with a thick CO2 atmosphere, which partially protects it from Meteors and Solar Flares. Outer planet with a Nitrogen atmosphere. The thickness of the atmosphere prevents much of the light from reaching the surface. Moon of a Gas Giant with no atmosphere, which leaves it very exposed to Meteors and Solar Flares, and unable to support Wind Turbines. Moon of a Gas Giant with thin but active atmosphere, constant thunderstorms pose a threat and methane lakes reduce buildable surface. Milestones Reach Population Reach Prestige Survive for one day Get new colonists to the base Acquire (1) Techs Build or purchase (1) bots Generate (1) of power Milestone Reached (1) Reached Survival One day after landing, your people are still alive Self-Sufficiency You now have the structures in place to sustain your colony Expansion You managed to get new colonists to arrive at your base Robotization Robotization will improve the efficiency of your colony Century Your colony now has 100 citizens Standing Your colony is known by everyone Powermonger You are now generating a ton of power Megalomania You have proven what you are capable of Technocracy You now have acquired all relevant techs Consolidation Your colony now has 300 citizens

Alert State Security Controls No Alert Yellow Alert Red Alert
Simple pad that can be used to expand the base cheaply Generates oxygen from electricity and water Basic communal sleeping facility. Sleeping facility with more confortable beds. Allows colonists to enter and exit the colony. Facility to process raw resources into usable materials Generates electricity from the wind (as long as there is an atmosphere) Generates electricity from light (as long as there is any) Stores electricity to use when none is being generated Extracts water from the soil Stores water for later use A place for colonists to eat and drink A place for colonists to relax and enjoy some drinks Facility to grow vegetables and plants Facility to create processed goods from basic resources A place to safely store resources, and prevent them from deteriorating A basic infirmary to treat colonists. Basic landing facility. Small colonist or trading ships can land here. Advanced landing facility. Large colonist, trading and visitor ships can land here. Display panel showing information about the colony A nice structure to highlight the success of your colony An epic and totally pointless symbol of achievement Facility to produce medical supplies and also to grow synthetic meat Bot construction and repair facility Place to control surveillance and communications structures Multiple purpose leisure and fitness building A way to contact vessels traveling near your planet Detects incoming disasters. Allows Anti Meteor Laser to aim and destroy meteors In coordination with the Telescope, can destroy meteors that would potentially hit the base Protects an area around it from lightning strikes, will also harvest their energy. A place to extract Ore from the ground. Needs to be placed at the base of a mountain.
Any two colonists can get some rest here. Colonists can get some rest here, restores some Morale also. Creates Bioplastic from Starch. Creates Metal from Ore. An engineer can make Spares here. An engineer can make Semiconductors here. An engineer can make Guns here. A regular pine tree. Produces oxygen during the day, consumes some oxygen at night. Colonists can relax by looking at it for a bit. A regular oak tree. Produces oxygen during the day, consumes some oxygen at night. Colonists can relax by looking at it for a bit. A hydroponic Vegetable Pad. A vegetable pad where to grow Medicinal Plants. Creates Meals from Vegetables or Vitromeat.(n)If there is enough variety of ingredients, will create nicer meals that restore morale. Produces nice Alcoholic Drinks that colonists can consume to relax. A place for colonists to have a drink. A place for colonists to have a drink. Colonists can drink water here to increase their hydration levels. A table where up to 4 colonists can eat their meals. A table where up to 2 colonists can eat their meals. A nice plant. A screen where colonists can watch the news and other shows. A worker will monitor a Radio Antenna from here. An Engineer will monitor a Telescope from here. A Guard will monitor suspicious activity in a few structures from this Console. This will allow you to detect intruders before they kill anybody. A fancy exercise machine where people can de-stress by running in place A simple exercise bar where people can de-stress by doing pull-ups A simple bench where people can chill out for a while Bots can get automatically repaired here. An Engineer can build Bots here. Vitromeat is produced here. A place for a Medic to make Medical Supplies. A place to store Guns. A place to store Medical Supplies. Colonists can receive medical treatment here.
This is the normal base status. All colonists perform their duties as normal. When the base is on yellow alert:(n) -All colonists will stay indoors.(n) -Medics and guards will stay on duty for longer. When the base is on red alert:(n) -All colonists will stay indoors.(n) -Medics and guards will stay on duty for longer.(n) -Colonists will fight enemies by any means necessary.

Allows the construction of Goliath Wind Turbines (larger Wind Turbines) Allows the construction of Colossal Solar Panels (larger Solar Panels) Allows the construction of Massive Storages (larger Storage) Allows the construction of Farm-Domes (larger Bio-Domes) Allows the construction of Mega Collectors (larger Power Collectors) Allows the construction of Super Extractors (larger Water Extractors) Allows the manufacturing of Constructor Bots Allows the manufacturing of Driller Bots Allows you to plant GM Tomatoes, which grow faster, however some say these are dangerous for your health Allows you to plant GM Onions, which grow faster, however some say these are dangerous for your health
Challenges Select Challenge Quit Continue Challenge Completed Challenge Failed You didn't manage to achieve your goals. Better luck next time! Objective Disabled in this challenge You need to complete the (1) challenge in order to play this one
Planetbase Corp Mining Station Alpha Station Alpha
Your first assignment is to establish a fully automated mining outpost in a remote world.(n) You will have to accomplish your mission with limited personnel as you won't be getting any more colonists. Some traders operate in the area so you might be able to buy supplies from them.(n)
Accumulate 100 units of Ore You've successfully completed your first assignment for Planetbase Corp.
Starport Atlantis Starport Atlantis
Your next mission is to take over the management of Starport Atlantis. This is a facility that acts as a waypoint for various trading and mining routes, you will have to expand it and turn a profit quickly.(n) There are no resources in this planet, so any supplies you might need you will have to purchase from traders.(n)
Accumulate 1000 Coins in less than 30 days Objetive completed. You can now proceed to the next mission.
Frozen Cage Frozen Cage
While traveling to your next assignment, the life support systems in your vessel have broken down, and you've been forced to perform an emergency landing on the nearest planet.(n) You are unsure of what awaits there, but the only chance of survival seems to be to try to communicate with base station and hope for a rescue.(n) Build 3 Radio Antennas and Radio Consoles.(n)Survive for 15 days. All objetives completed. You can now proceed to the final mission.
Dark Moon Dark Moon Planetbase corp has now tasked you with colonizing a distant planet out of reach of all major trading routes. No atmosphere, short days and long nights make it a real challenge. Reach 300 colonists Objective completed. You've now completed all Planetbase Corp challenges.
Freeman Chronicles Solitude Tinto Base
For years Aristarchus Freeman was a top engineer at Planetbase Corp, but eventually he couldn't take the stress anymore and decided to start his own operation.(n) He bought a few second hand bots on the black market and headed for the Tinto planet, a resource rich but dangerous iron ball at the edge of the galaxy.(n) His plan was to make a living on his own by mining the planet and buying all other resources from the traders that ocasionally travel the area.(n) Hint: Lightning Rods don't need to be repaired with spares.(n) thema Get 15 bots.(n)Build: 4 Mines, 1 large Storage, 1 Starport and 2 Bot Auto Repairs. Well done, you've succesfully set up your own mining station!
Green Acolytes Green Mother
Aristarchus was quite happy chilling out on his own, when he received a transmission from the Green Acolytes.(n) As a group of vegan plant lovers, they prefer to live separated from mainstream society. This time however, they've were looking to hire an external engineer.(n) The acolytes wanted to overhaul one of their colonies in a remote frozen world. This sounded like an interesting challenge, so he decided to take the job.(n) Hint: Make sure to always have a few Constructor Bots at the base, to keep all structures in good shape.
Build a massive Bio-Dome (Requires Tech).(n)Plant 12 Oak Trees and 12 Pine Trees.(n)Reach 200 prestige. The colony is a big success!(n)The Green Acolytes are very happy!
The Martians S.O.S
After spending all his money, Freeman had to take a very risky contract to build a base in one of the harshest desert planets in the sector. Unfortunately, soon after landing, a sandstorm hit the ship and most of the crew died.(n) The situation was desperate. The 3 lone survivors had to build the basic structures to keep themselves alive, and then try to ready the ship. In order to do this, they would try to manufacture a couple of bots to perform some repairs on the damaged vessel, and mine some Ore to use as fuel.(n) Because of the lack of medical supplies, humans will be not doing any mining work in this challenge.(n) Hint: Try to salvage all resources before they decay.(n)
Use Driller Bots to accumulate 2 Ore.(n)Build 2 Constructor Bots.(n) The survivors managed to repair the ship and got out of the planet.
Error Could not save file: (1) Could not load file: (1)(n)File is probably corrupted, try deleting it Challenge not found
Failure
All your colonists are now dead, unfortunately you didn't succeed in creating a viable colony.(n) But this is part of the learning experience, maybe next time you can try a different base layout or build order.
You can also check the Metagame section inside the help menu, it provides a more in depth look at the trickier mechanics in the game. We would also suggest you play the tutorial, as it explains the basics of the game.
Achievements Planetary Apprentice Complete tutorial Link to the future Build two structures and connect them Space Farmer Have at least 20 Vegetable boxes in your base at any given time Capitalist Have at least 1000 Coins in your base at any given time Cyber Miner Have at least 6 Driller Bots and 2 operational Mines at any given time Robo Colony Build a base with at least 100 colonists, with at least 25% of Bots High Spirits Build a base with at least 100 colonists and 95% welfare ratio Stargazer Have 5 operational Telescopes at any given time Steel Dome Have 3 operational lasers, telescopes and telescope consoles at any given time Express Outpost Build a base with at least 100 colonists in less than 30 days Express Colony Build a base with at least 250 colonists in less than 60 days Hoarder Fill a Massive Storage to more than 90% Megastructures Build all massive structures Police State Have at least 20 armed Guards in your base at any given time Genetic Engineer Build a GM tomato and GM onion pad Desert Landing Land on the desert planet Frozen Landing Land on the frozen planet Moon Landing Land on the gas giant moon Desert Base Build a base with at least 100 colonists on the desert planet Frozen Base Build a base with at least 100 colonists on the frozen planet Moon Base Build a base with at least 100 colonists on the moon planet Overpopulation Build a base with at least 350 colonists Hyper Megalomaniac Build monoliths on all planets Absolute Domination Complete all milestones on all planets Storm Landing Land on the storm planet Storm Base Build a base with at least 100 colonists on the storm planet Challenger Complete one challenge Hyper Challenger Complete all builtin challenges Express Starport Complete Starport Atlantis challenge in less than 15 days Express Dark Colony Complete Dark Moon challenge in less than 70 days
